column2: notablefor=leading the band who massacred [[Barahir]] and his company

column3: 4}}</ref> He is noted as being the leader of the band who slew [[Barahir]] and his men at [[massacre at Tarn Aeluin
column4: Tarn Aeluin]] and as such claimed the [[Ring of Barahir]] which he was ordered to retrieve to prove the feat. Gorgol's orcs were later attacked by [[Beren]], Barahir's son, and slain, Beren reclaiming his father's ring.
